1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Message
4  ( -- * Abortable
5    abAssert,
6    -- * Message
7    unkOption,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base    as B
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax  as S
12
13abAssert :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.Map (B.Ab b)
14abAssert = B.abortable "assert"
15
16-- | Unknown option
17unkOption :: S.ParaUnmatch String -> B.Ab a
18unkOption un = Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown option" detail where
19    detail = case un of
20               S.ParaOutOfRange n p  -> ["Positional parameter out of range",
21                                         "Expect " ++ expect p ++
22                                         ", but actural " ++ show n]
23               S.ParaUnknown  ns     -> ["Unknown parameter name", unwords ns]
24               S.ParaMissing  ns     -> ["Missing parameter name", unwords ns]
25               S.ParaMultiple ns     -> ["Repeated parameter name", unwords ns]
26
27    expect (S.ParaItem     a _)    = "just " ++ show a
28    expect (S.ParaItemOpt  a _ _)  = "minimum " ++ show a
29    expect (S.ParaItemRest a _ _)  = "minimum " ++ show a
30    expect (S.ParaMin      a)      = "minimum " ++ show a
31    expect (S.ParaRange a b)
32        | a == b      = "just "    ++ show b
33        | a == 0      = "maximum " ++ show b
34        | otherwise   = "between " ++ show a ++ " and " ++ show b
35
